mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_music tm LEFT JOIN t_music_connect_singer tmcs ON tm.id = tmcs.musicId LEFT JOIN t_singer ts ON tmcs.singerId = ts.id

SELECT tm.id AS musicId, ts.`name` AS singerName, tm.musicName, tm.resume, tm.compose, CONCAT( img.path, '/', img.NAME ) AS image, aud.path AS audio FROM t_music tm LEFT JOIN t_music_connect_singer tmcs ON tm.id = tmcs.musicId LEFT JOIN t_singer ts ON tmcs.singerId = ts.id LEFT JOIN t_image_database img ON tm.imageId = img.id LEFT JOIN t_audio_database aud ON tm.audioId = aud.id

SELECT ts.`name` AS singerName, tm.musicName AS musicName, tm.compose AS compose, CONCAT(tid.path,'/',tid.name) AS image FROM t_music tm LEFT JOIN t_music_connect_singer tmcs ON tm.id = tmcs.musicId LEFT JOIN t_singer ts ON tmcs.singerId = ts.id LEFT JOIN t_image_database tid ON tm.imageId = tid.id
